subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain was wild in his first start, which lasted less than three innings, and the Blue Jays took advantage of a sloppy performance by a bullpen that misses him.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain was wild in his first start, which lasted less than three innings, and the Blue Jays took advantage of a sloppy performance by a bullpen that misses him.
